mapper.select: select CS.USER_NUMBER, CS.SPOT_NUMBER, CRS.REPORT_NUMBER,CRS.SPOT_LAT,CRS.SPOT_ING,SPOT_NAME from CLEAN_SPOT CS JOIN CLEAN_REPORT_SPOT CRS on CS.SPOT_NUMBER = CRS.SPOT_NUMBER where USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber}

select route_number, user_number, route_name, route_slat, route_slng, route_sname, route_dlat, route_dlng, route_dname, route_v1lat, route_v1lng, route_v1name, route_v2lat, route_v2lng, route_v2name, route_v3lat, route_v3lng, route_v3name from CLEAN_ROUTE where USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber}
